If you're ready to move up into a residence that delivers on everything your growing family needs, it doesn't get much better than this. Set towards the end of a peaceful and private cul de sac with minimal traffic flow, this outstanding four-bedroom plus study two-storey home with city views is a dream come true.
The dream of living amongst abundant space is therefore a reality here, with multiple living zones a clear example of the home's suitability for the large family. Packaged with loads of natural light, towering cathedral ceilings, a triple garage and excellent presentation, it's also a home that you could move straight into without having to lift a finger.
The elegant nature of the formal dining room and formal lounge (with open fireplace) set against a stunning feature staircase delivers refined quality and style, while a radiant open-plan meals/kitchen area (with curved island bench, stone surfaces and loads of storage space) effortlessly unites the household in the heart of the home.
Enjoy movie nights with the kids in the fantastic rumpus room (with wet bar), while a generous collection of four spacious bedrooms that includes a downstairs master bedroom (with spa ensuite) offers family comfort and flexibility.
A tranquil paved area in the private backyard invites you to dine beneath a star-lit sky, while underground power, upstairs retreat with balcony access, open fireplace, ducted heating and split-system cooling are further highlights.
City commuters will enjoy being in the CBD within 25 minutes (approx.) via the Eastern Freeway, and if you prefer to travel into the city via transport, you'll love the close proximity of the Park + Ride. Macedon Square shops and cafes, Westfield Doncaster, excellent schools and the Koonung Creek Trail are also within quick and easy reach and enhance the neighbourhood's family lifestyle appeal.

Description:
More like a house 45sqm living
Multiple living areas and bedrooms of generous proportions are at the heart of this grand and luxurious 45sq (approx.) executive family residence. And with a premier location close to shops, schools, parks and transport, its the perfect lifestyle package for a host of buyers.
The fluid, three-level layout enhanced with superior finishes and a fully-tiled ensuite and walk-in robe to every bedroom embodies all that is great about luxurious low-maintenance living, and in doing so, delivers an executive residence that clearly belongs to a higher class of living.
Introducing a relaxed contemporary lounge on entry with access to a private study, the long and impressive hallway glides beyond the deluxe guest bedroom before arriving at the sun-kissed north-facing open-plan living domain thats spectacular in every sense. Wall-to-wall stacker doors filter loads of northern sunshine into the sleek living space, while a first-class kitchen with a huge island breakfast bar, stone surfaces, intelligent storage options, quality Smeg stainless steel appliances and a Butlers pantry is an entertainers dream.
If the indoor entertaining options are not enough, a private north-facing yard with a sunny deck and in-ground swimming pool (both sheltered with retractable awnings) completes the picture, integrating seamlessly with the fashionable interior to create a dream indoor-outdoor lifestyle configuration.
A central retreat upstairs acts as a successful buffer between the glamorous master bedroom (with city views from its private balcony) and two generous-sized bedrooms, while a large basement level comfortably accommodates an excellent home gym room, cellar, large laundry, workshop and remote double garage.
Dressed with established landscaped gardens, this high-impact low-maintenance home also flaunts stunning square-set high ceilings, polished timber floorboards throughout the two ground-floor living areas, ducted heating/cooling, on-trend lighting, no common land and its own stylish street frontage.
Be the lucky one to call it home and enjoy living within short walking distance of the scenic Koonung Creek Trail and Marshall Avenue Reserve and just minutes from Doncaster primary and secondary schools, city-bound bus services, Westfield Doncaster, Ruffey Lake Park, Jackson Court shops and cafes, the Eastern Freeway and the heart of Box Hill.
